name: Sun Goes BOOM!
description:
7 billion years passed and sun depleted its supply of hydrogen and helium. It becoming red giant. Sun swalowed mercury venus and now earth. You have to escape exploding sun. Travel across solar system and explore planets. Rewind time  10sec by collecting orbs. Orbs rewind sun explosion and gives fuel for your spaceship)

• 6 Unique levels(6 panets to visit)

• A LOT of particles explosions

• Cartoony artstyle

• Physics based
